history.content: I generally assume nobody bothered taking those postings down and that they're no longer open; the best indicator is probably the inner description, and also save for finance related roles really not too many people are looking to fill spots for summer 2022 just yet so assuming you're looking at something engineering related I would guess its not open anymore

I don't know where to put this, but could someone help me navigate the website? I was looking through some job postings on Handshake and some have weird info posted. Like this one has the application ddl after the seasonal role ends, and I believe I have seen a couple of others with the same problem. Also, not all jobs( specifically internships) have the seasonal role section, so is it safe to assume they mean next summer if they are still up at this point? 

Any help would be appreciated!
